content: I was actually experimenting with different flavor combinations and stumbled upon a recipe for a lavender gin fizz. I used gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and a few drops of lavender extract. I think it was the unique flavor of the lavender that really made the drink stand out. And speaking of unique flavors, I've been meaning to try out that new farm-to-table restaurant in town, Harvest Kitchen. I've heard great things about their craft cocktail menu, especially their spring-inspired Collins made with gin, lemon juice, and elderflower liqueur.
